search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Landingi (landingi.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Landingi is available at: [https://landingi.com/pricing/](https://landingi.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Transparent Pricing Plans - Choose Your Best Fit | Landingi

extracted_content.content:
**Automate Your Landing Pages. Save Time and Resources.**
---------------------------------------------------------

Start a 14-day free trial. No upfront payments. Fast and free POCs for Enterprise. Select a plan to get started.

Pay monthly

Pay yearly (save 2+ months)

### Free

**1 active landing page**

**Unlimited conversions**

**500 visits per month**

1 custom domain

The plan is designed to learn how to build, optimize, and publish your first landing page with Landingi.

### Lite

**10 active landing pages**

**Unlimited conversions**

**5000 visits per month**

1 custom domain

**Lite plan includes:**

Landing Page Builder

Form Builder

Fast Cloud Hosting

Integrations & 400+ Templates

Pre-designed Sections

AI Assistant

Basic Analytics and Reporting

Migration Services

Unbeatable Market Offer!

### Professional

**Unlimited active landing pages**

Unlimited conversions

50,000 visits per month

10 custom domains

Everything in Lite plus:

Programmatic Landing Pages

Multi-lang Personalization

Server Side A/B Testing

Smart Sections

E-commerce Hub

Custom Fonts

Marketing Funnels

Pop-up Builder

Flat Price Against Billing Surprise

### Enterprise

**Unlimited active landing pages**

**Unlimited conversions**

**Unlimited visits**

100 custom domains

**Everything in Professional plus:**

Audit Log Records

Domain Whitelisting

Enterprise SSO

Team Workspaces

EventTracker

Custom Development

Custom Paper Work

Dedicated Account Manager

### Compare all features and details across plans

![Image 1: Capterra logo](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/image-25-1.svg)

4.8/5 (207 reviews)

![Image 2: G2 logo](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/image-26-1.svg)

4.5/5 (354 reviews)

Join leading brands that grow their business with Landingi
----------------------------------------------------------

![Image 3](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/migrate-optimized.png)

### Effortless Migration

Switching to Landingi has never been easier. Whether you’re moving from another platform or starting fresh, our migration process is designed to be smooth, fast, and hassle-free.

I’m migrating from

Select your platform

Unbounce

Instapage

Leadpages

WordPress

ClickFunnels

Webflow

Carrd

Wix

Other

![Image 4: Free onboarding demo](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Frame-2608758-1-660x193-optimized.webp)

### Schedule a Free Demo Call

Book a free 1:1 session with our onboarding team to see a live demo, get expert guidance on key features, ask questions, and explore best practices. No commitment—just insights to help you succeed!

### Power up your Landingi plan with add-ons!

![Image 5](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Image-2.svg)

Add-on

### EventTracker

$49/month

Gain valuable insights into every visit to improve performance, rankings, and user experience.

![Image 6](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/image-block.svg)

Add-on

### Agency Hub

$149/month

Manage clients’ subaccounts. Engage your whole team with advanced permissions and Audit Logs. Unbrand platform.

![Image 7](https://landingi.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Image-1.svg)

Service

### Landing Page Design

$649/project

A project dedicated to a defined goal or universal landing page template consistent with your brand.  
[](https://landingi.com/offers/landing-page-design/#PZWVcIQi9MqA8W14x8vEiAg8yxnwmMT9)

### Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need to provide my credit card information?

We request your valid credit card details to safeguard against fraudulent activity in our Platform and to ensure uninterrupted service when your free 14-day trial ends and transitions into a paid subscription. You have the option to cancel your account or update your payment method at any time during the trial period.

If you can’t provide a credit card for some reason, please contact our Support Team, and they will enable a trial for you anyway. It is crucial to confirm that you are a real Customer.

How does the 14-day free trial work?We offer free trials for all our plans. These trials give you full access to all the plan’s features. To start a free trial, enter your credit card information. This step is required to safeguard against scams and phishing.

Your trial will end when you decide to upgrade, hit trial traffic limits (limited to 200 visits for all plans in the trial), or reach the end of your trial period without canceling. After the trial ends, your credit card will be charged, and you’ll be subscribed to the plan of your choice.

Towards the end of the trial period, we’ll send you a reminder email that your credit card is about to be charged. You can cancel your free trial at any time during the free trial period. Log into your account, go to the Account Management tab, select Subscriptions, and click Cancel. Your credit card will not be charged.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan during the free trial?You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time during your trial.

What payment methods do you offer?We accept all major credit cards and PayPal. We also support transactions in a range of currencies: USD, EUR, GBP, PLN, BRL.

What happens when my trial ends?If you choose one of our paid plans after 14 days, you’ll become a paid subscriber to the plan you selected when registering for your free trial. Your charges will depend on the plan level and billing cycle you choose. During checkout, you’ll see the exact amount you’ll be charged (including taxes) and the date of your first payment.

Check out our pricing and find out everything about each plan to make the best decision for your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual billing offers a discount equivalent to 2 months free.
